scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w ui"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build:types && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate ./workdir/sensemaker_happ.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a sensemaker_happ network mdns" "npm run playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/sensemaker/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/test_provider/workdir
